TopicTitle: You must use the object that is on your left hand to save a doomed spaceship.

Articles.Content:
Both my hands are holding each other.

This should be interesting.

A ceramic bowl.

Might serve as an engine bell...that would work only at low low low throttle
iPad. I could contact mission contrololo. Still sounds like a failure.

Fuel. I could... if it does not explode.

P.S.: I'm posting this with my left hand, by the way.
My wooden dinosaur model, this is going to be very interesting...

I have my laptop with Skype, KSP, Zoo Tycoon, Simcity 4, Microsoft Office, and a worship service power point program...

Maybe I could plot a coarse with KSP, construct a biosphere using Zoo Tycoon, Make some excel spread sheets and mission reports, create a worship service to keep morale up, and contact mission control to figure out how to fly the thing.

My remote.

CATASTROPHIC FAILURE.

WASD and LSHIFT.

THROTTLEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE

BOOM
My iPhone. I could call for help, or listen to music decisions decisions.
My jaw. well i'm screwed.

my foot.........

Its hard to type with my right hand,since my typing is mostly done by my left hand.............
A box with a box with a box inside it.

Pile of blueprints, 40kg Presstool for hydraulic press, caliper, 3Dconnexion spacemouse pro, pile of screwed up sheetmetal samples from the press, Laptop, almost empty cartridge with industrial glue, 30cm long zinccoated steel rod.

I thing i would figure out how to save the ship with it.

(Yes iam at work, surfing on internet and not working. )

A gallon of beer in a growler! This should be a breeze!

KOCOUR, have you figured out how to use that 3DConnexion mouse in KSP?
my phone. Frick. Uh... is the doom immenent? Maybe I can send a distress text!
My Head...i can use my brain and figure out what's wrong, then solve it...wew...

I was actually adjusting my laptop screen.

[Edits save file]
My face? How could it help them?

22 hours ago, RoninFrog said:

I was actually adjusting my laptop screen.

[Edits save file]

Step one: make a quick save.

step 2: edit the sfs of that quick save.

3: adjust the craft to be in orbit, and adjust its reference number to anything.

Tada!!!!!!!
Diet Coke. I'm toast!
Absolutely nothing. Unless you count the germs on my hand...

4 hours ago, Misguided_Kerbal said:

Absolutely nothing. Unless you count the germs on my hand...

Air. You're grabbing air. And they need air to breathe.

At last somebody suggested them something useful.

the forums. (I'm using a touchscreen)

so now I'm crashing on kerbin instead

The desktop and the heating radiator.

I'll calculate the proper maneuver and push out the heavy radiator for delta-V.

A couch. I can make dust masks and a parachute, or a fabric cover for something like an air filter. There's also pieces of wood in the frame that I can use to make new structures. There is also plenty of thermal insulation inside.
